# (PART)  APPENDICIES {-} 


# A : Data Catalogue {-}


## Cockburn data catalogue {-}

The CSIEM data-set is accessible via the `csiem-data` [GitHub repository](https://github.com/AquaticEcoDynamics/csiem-data). Please refer to the master data catalogue spreadsheet therein for detailed data provenance information. 

A brief summary of the available data categorised by these data types and by agency/supplier is available by viewing the [CSIEM DATA SNAPHOT](https://github.com/SEAF-CS/csiem-data/blob/main/data-governance/csiem_data_snapshot.pdf). Please note, this document is periodically updated, associated with updates to versions to the model and data availability.

For data acess options please refer to these [ACCESS INSTRUCTIONS](https://github.com/SEAF-CS/csiem-data/wiki/Access).



## {.panelset .unnumbered}

### V1.6 Dataset Overview {.unnumbered}
 
```{r A-datasummary16, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
library(rmarkdown)
library(stringr)

theSheet_Names <- list.files(path = "results/DATA/2021_2025/HTML", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
           full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
           ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)

theSheet_Names2 <- list.files(path = "results/DATA/2013_2024/HTML", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
           full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
           ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)

theSheet_Names3 <- list.files(path = "results/DATA/2001_2012/HTML", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
           full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
           ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)

theSheet <- paste(
  "<",'a href="results/DATA/2021_2025/HTML/',theSheet_Names,'"',">",theSheet_Names,"<",'/a',">",",",
  "<",'a href="results/DATA/2013_2024/HTML/',theSheet_Names2,'"',">",theSheet_Names2,"<",'/a',">",",",
  "<",'a href="results/DATA/2001_2012/HTML/',theSheet_Names3,'"',">",theSheet_Names3,"<",'/a',">",
  sep = "")

theSheet <- str_split_fixed(theSheet, ',', 3)


kbl(theSheet, caption = "Data summary in CSIEM V1.6 (ingested) data-set. Please note that other data-sets are included in the CSIEM data-lake that may not appear on these images. Please refer to the data snapshot link above for the current data summary list.", align = "l",escape = F,col.names = c("V1.6  (2021-2025)","V1.6 (2013-2024)","V1.6 (2001-2012)"), ) %>%
row_spec(0, background = "#14759e", bold = TRUE, color = "white") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T,font_size = 10) %>%
    scroll_box(fixed_thead = FALSE)
```



### V2.0 Dataset Overview {.unnumbered}
 
```{r A-datasummary15, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
library(rmarkdown)
library(stringr)

theSheet_Names <- list.files(path = "HTML/Performance/GEN2/HTML", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
           full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
           ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)

theSheet_Names2 <- list.files(path = "HTML/Performance/TRAN/HTML", pattern = NULL, all.files = FALSE,
           full.names = FALSE, recursive = FALSE,
           ignore.case = FALSE, include.dirs = FALSE, no.. = FALSE)

theSheet <- paste(
  "<",'a href="HTML/Performance/GEN2/HTML/',theSheet_Names,'"',">",theSheet_Names,"<",'/a',">",",",
  "<",'a href="HTML/Performance/TRAN/HTML/',theSheet_Names2,'"',">",theSheet_Names2,"<",'/a',">",
  sep = "")

theSheet <- str_split_fixed(theSheet, ',', 2)


kbl(theSheet, caption = "Pending.)", align = "l",escape = F,col.names = c("Pending","Pending"), ) %>%
row_spec(0, background = "#14759e", bold = TRUE, color = "white") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T,font_size = 10) %>%
    scroll_box(fixed_thead = FALSE)
```
